Sparkling clean and beautiful. Better described as an up-market granny flat though, they've made every effort to make it private and have done very well. Just something for people to be aware of :)
Beautiful hosts and accommodation with everything you need. Spa was a special treat. Easy walk to main street of Tanunda. Also several wineries withing walking distance. Highly recommended!
Fantastic! So much more stylish than the photos could portray!

What a beautiful stay! The host is such a warm gentleman and very helpful! 
We got a beautiful bottle of wine too!!! 
We will definitely recommend this place and will definitely be back! X

Murnane's Studio 57 is very well equipped for a weekend away in the Barossa, either using it as a bedtime base or having some quiet time at the Studio. It is warm and cozy, very well set up, and aesthetically very lovely too.

The studio was spotlessly clean, well provisioned, modern and with everything working. It was perfect for our needs as a base from which to ride the Barossa Cycling trail. It's tastefully furnished,  comfortable and relaxing, in a quiet location. The wine and chocolate were most appreciated. Thank you, we recommend it very highly and would stay again!

For us this was just a stunning studio in a perfect spot for visiting some local wineries. From the moment we checked in we were greeted and given some tips on local places to eat and drink, the amenities and extra touches exceeded any expectations I could have had, and the studio itself was clean and modern and just perfect for a few nights away. I can't think of anything that could be done better at this spot and I would definitely stay again on another trip to the barossa.
This is a great place to stay if you want to explore the wineries of the area. The place was clean and comfortable. We really enjoyed our short break here.

Had the a fantastic 2 days away in this perfect little apartment. Had full ambition to go out and enjoy culinary delights of local restaurants and bars for days but felt much more comfortable staying in and in joying the unique atmosphere this little place had to offer !
Sparkling clean studio bedroom with all the amenities of a hotel and lots of little thoughtful touches such as local wine, chocolate, milk. Would definitely stay again.
Very comfortable and clean with amazing hospitality. Excellent value for money in ideal location

This air bnb was amazing! So much better than expected, the room is so  big - it’s like a self contained unit! So warm and comfortable. The host was lovely and took us to some wineries for a far cheaper price than a taxi! Perfect place for a little weekend escape from the city and the location is fantastic to get to all the local wineries. Thank you for a wonderful stay, we will be back :)

Lindsay and Annemaree were lovely hosts ! 'Studio 57' offered a cosy and luxurious little hide away to unwind and relax in for a couple of days with all the amenities one could ask for. The wine, chocolate, newspaper and bath robes were just some of the special little touches.

We stayed here as part of a weekend in the Barossa, and it didn’t disappoint! You are sooo close to everywhere you could possibly want to visit. The space is lovely and very very clean! We were just shocked by how close the Airbnb was to the owners house, as it is not part of the description! Overall we had a lovely stay.
Very Clean and spacious, everything you need and perfectly decorated, areas inside and out to sit and relax, close to the main road if you like walking or a $10 taxi ride to most places

Unfortunately we couldn’t wait to leave. Lindsay entered the unit on three separate occasions during our stay and only had the courtesy to let us know the once. This made us feel uneasy from the very start of our stay. 
I also cancelled a wine tour with Lindsay and the way he spoke was beyond belief. I’m certainly glad I cancelled in the end. 
On a good note having spent most of our time out of the unit we had a fantastic time in the Barossa.

Stylish, got everything you need. Great place for 2. Lindsay was a great host and made sure we had everything when we settled in.  Got an outdoor BBQ and spa, too bad we didn't get a chance to enjoy either because the weather was just too cold.

Studio 57 is extremely clean and quaint. It is very well dressed. The photographs don't do it justice. Very private from the hosts residence and the outdoor area is amazing. The studio had everything we needed. The bed is firmer than I am used to but still extremely comfortable. We were there for my partner's birthday and they even left us a birthday card! A highly recommended bnb! We will be back!
Staying at this place was great. It is clean and tidy and well equipped and in a good location. We had a great time and would visit again.
Murnanes place is a lovely little retreat, spotlessly clean and with some nice touches. We would definitely stay again

Loved our stay at Studio 57.  The photos really don’t do this place justice.  It was much larger than we were expecting and we loved all of the little extras (robes, wine, chocolate, milk etc).  We would without a doubt stay here again, and have already recommended it to some friends.

Fantastic hosts! Would stay again anytime given the chance. Great space topped off with the host being our chauffeur for our winery tour. Would recommend to anyone looking for accommodation in the Barossa!
As well as accommodation, Lindsey does personalised tours of the Barossa which we can recommend. You get to go where you want to go at your own pace!
Great location - close proximity to wineries & town. Clean, comfortable and nice amenities.

What a great experience! This is such a nice place to stay in Barossa valley. The pictures really don't do justice to this very nice appartement. The location is quiet, the town center and some wineries (including Peter Lehmann if you are looking for big one) are in walking distance and the hosts are super nice. Nothing to worry about in this appartement! Super clean, super comfy and it has everything you need incl. a BBQ place, a whirlpool, nice terasse to have breakfast or BBQ outside and general items like a huge fridge, dishes, glases, etc. . We have also booked a wine tour with Lindsay (the host) and it was a blast. My wife and me highly recommend it if you stay here! It is a private tour and you can discuss upfront with Lindsay where to go. We left out the big wineries and went to some small wineries and a brewery, which we would never have found without Lindsay. It is definitely a special wine tour as Lindsay is well-known in the area and has a huge knowledge about it. It gave us a really special feeling as we never felt like normal "tourists" going from winery to winery, but more like locals meeting friends and drink some wine...well, we were still tourists :-) , but it was a great experience. Definitely the best stay during our holiday!
A1

Studio 57 is a self-sufficient aesthetically-pleasing spot. Had everything we needed. Pictures don’t do justice. Great location, so central for us to get around. Even walking distance if you’d like that too. We were celebrating a birthday and were pleasantly surprised with a bottle of wine and a birthday card upon arrival. Very sweet of Lindsay and Annemaree to go that extra mile. We booked a wine tour with Lindsay as well, he knows the best spots. Pillows are plenty and bed is very comfy, but if you can only sleep on a firm pillow - bring your own. Don’t leave without saying hi to Denzel (the cutest Cavoodle in Tannunda). Forgot our passports behind and Annemaree was kind enough to send them back to us by post. Can’t recommend this place enough!

Clean and stylish studio. 
Great tips about where to visit and enjoy a great meal.
Great hospitality

Great place to stay!
Very helpful hosts who were there when needing guidance but respectful of your privacy.  Place was exactly as described. Clean, well located with lots of thoughtful extras. Would definitely stay again
the place was lovely and the hosts were extremely friendly. made us feel right at home! highly recommend!
Was a lovely place to stay, really clean and comfortable! Lots of little tips of where to go and what to see
Lovely place. Loved the spa bath and the small touches. Very relaxing stay. Will highly recommend
Great place to stay, close to everything and the unit has everything you could want.
Very clean space, everything you need and more. Close to everything. Very friendly host. Bed very comfortable and great shower. Will be back again.
A great place with awesome amenities. The spa, bathroom and outdoor area were amazing. Nice cozy spot for a romantic getaway. The hosts were prompt and helpful also. Highly recommended.

Great location for the Barossa.
Spotlessly clean - could eat off the floor! If you are a clean freak this place won't disappoint.
Lindsay met us on arrival and showed us around his lovely little place.
Our only criticism was that the property is on the same grounds as the hosts - not sure this was mentioned on the site posting. Though the hosts didn't interfere or disturb us at all.
The spa in the back overlooks what is possibly a "shared" garden. Lindsay assured us that the blinds on his house which possibly overlooked the rear yard were constantly pulled down during our stay (which they were) but we just didn't feel comfortable having a spa.
That aside a great place to stay

We absolutely loved our stay at Studio 57! The perfect spot for a romantic getaway. Lindsay was a wonderful host, responding quickly to all communication and meeting us on arrival to show us around. The space is beautifully styled and absolutely spotless. The bed super comfortable, the spa and fireplace a treat. We can't recommend this place highly enough.

Studio 57 was absolutely perfect for our 2 person getaway. The apartment was sparkling clean, homey and had all the amenities you would need. The hosts also run wine tours which is super convenient, and we had the absolute pleasure of having a private tour with Lindsay organizing it for us. Although we went in middle of winter, when we were at the apartment at night we spent most of our time in the gorgeous outdoor area in the spa, with the heater on and a glass of wine. I would definitely recommend, perfect stay and very helpful and kind hosts. Thankyou!
Small, but clean and new.  Limited indoor and outdoor space   - note this a studio in the owners backyard.
We had a wonderful weekend at Studio 57! It is immaculately clean and every need is catered for in a beautiful space! We look forward to coming again!

Although this property is in the same yard as the owners you would not be able to tell from inside the studio apartment. It was sparkling clean and they have thought of everything!!! There was a screen in the outdoor patio area which made it feel very secluded and private. The hot tub is to die for. I would definitely stay here again!!
Awesome Apartment clean, modern and comfortable close to town centre and recommend the wine tour with Lindsay in his luxurious Holden HSV Grange.

This place is super cozy! Lots of little touches to make you feel welcome and at home. Location is perfect, just a few minutes to the main road in Tanunda with plenty of drinking/eating options and a short drive to several wineries.
Great little spot with friendly and knowledgeable hosts!
Lovely place, in mint condition! Would happily come back!

Very comfortable and clean studio with all the amenities in a very convenient location.
Great way to spend a long weekend
Sparkling clean with modern decor.  Quiet location and reasonably close to the main street shops.

What a place ! Might be the best Airbnb we had so far. Very well equipped and designed. We've even been welcomed with a red wine bottle and chocolate. Located in Tanunda, the perfect departure spot for a wineries tour.
Great spot!
Amazing stay. Easy checkin. Hosts were so helpful. A+++

Great accommodation for 
 relaxing after a busy wine tour. Walkable distance to local restaurants, cafes and shops! Hosts were accommodating with change of travel details due to COVID which was great! Highly recommend staying here while enjoying the Barossa!
Wonderful place
Great little space to chill out in and relax after a big day in the Barossa. Fantastic location and close to amenities. Hosts were very easy going and approachable. Would highly recommend
Very beautiful place to stay, they have made the place comfortable and welcoming. Definitely recommend to stay

Spotless, 10 minute walk to restaurants and shops and lovely private garden. Charming homely touches everywhere, everything you could possibly need is provided. Had to cut our stay short due to COVID lockdown but would love to come back one day.
Very lovely accomodation, great facilities, great location. Highly recommend this place! Lovely hosts :)
Lovely decor and outdoor area where the hot tub is, close to the main street!

Such a great apartment for a stay, it has all the amenities you could expect and more.
A great kitchenette, BBQ area with outdoor settings and Spa after a day at the wineries.

A great bed, with pillows to match, waterfall shower. Nice surprises with complimentary snacks provided. 

I will certainly be back, there was no annoying "ahhh I wish they had this here", it was all there. Great value for money.

Me and my wife stayed at studio 57 and had a absolute blast. The studio is a well designed and caters to every need. It also offers a large covered / non covered outdoor area with a jacuzzi and BBQ facilities. This is an ideal place to visit the barossa valley with walkimg distance from wineries, shops and restaurants. A must visit.

Extremely pleasant stay. A hidden gem in Barossa. Everything is well thought for you to feel in a 5-star location. The bed is comfortable, the decoration makes you feel at home. The outside jacuzzi is an extra that makes it even more delightful. A well-equipped bbq and a nice backyard may convince you to spend more time at home than visiting the vineyards. Every detail has a lot of care from the hosts. Not to mention the location. Right at the Tanunda’s centre,  which makes your life very convenient. 
Totally recommendable!!

We had such a great time during our stay. The accommodation was perfect for our kids free getaway,  with all the extra touches that made it feel really special and relaxing. the day tour with Lindsay was also a fantastic way to spend the day - we loved meeting some of the smaller winemakers and hearing their stories and history. Very much recommend!
My partner and I loved our stay. The location was perfect - close to wineries, restaurants and a bakery with good coffee. It was super clean and had everything we needed for the 3 days we were there
Very clean and comfortable space. Great location. Would highly recommend!

Had a lovely relaxing stay in a unique location,  just a few minutes walk to the local town. The garden was meticulously maintained, a wonderful sight whilst relaxing in the outdoor area and spa bath. Lindsay was great with communication, very welcoming and friendly throughout our stay.
Lindsay is a quick responder who goes the extra mile to make the stay comfortable and memorable, will be recommending to friends and family

The studio apartment is on the same block as the main house and although we did see Lindsay around, it is very private. It shares a driveway with the main house. The studio was very clean and tidy and they gifted us a bottle of wine for our stay which was a nice touch. The outdoor/spa area is shared with the main house although there is a privacy blind that can be pulled down. The house is also very close to the Main Street of Barossa and some wineries. Would recommend staying here!

Beautiful accomodation in the perfect location . Short walk to town centre and a few key wineries. We really enjoyed the little touches that made our stay extra comfortable - tea, coffee, even milk and fresh bread. Highly recommend !

What a terrific little gem to explore the Barossa from. Studio 57 was decked out with all the amenities that you would need for a memorable stay. 
I loved the private garden space, setup with a TV and tub, which was perfect to while the hours away with a bottle of red wine. 
Don't forget to try the restaurant '1918' whilst you are in town, serving up the best food & wine in their gorgeous garden area. 
The hosts were great, check-in was easy and hassle free. However note the studio is close the to the owners adjoining property, in case anyone was seeking pure privacy. 
I wouldn't hesitate to recommend. It was a wonderful spot! 5 stars.
Lovely space. Great location. Friendly host!

Studio 57 was spotless...
Many great touches milk in fridge wine chocolate port !!!
everything needed and more !!!
a great stay...
Winery tour was a very well spent day to remember ...
Great location in Tanunda, nearby many of Barossa’s best wineries! Presentation & cleanliness above standard.

Great little studio apartment!
Lindsay was a great host and helped us out will tips and advice
Would stay again
Very comfy for a couple
Fantastic place to stay, extremely clean, fantastic amenities. If you looking for perfection and are in the area this is a must to stay!

Five stars across the board - perfect for a weekend getaway. Barossa Villas is in a peaceful location just a few minutes from the best wineries, restaurants and other attractions including a gin distillery practically on your doorstep! The property is very quiet and extremely well equipped with stylish furnishings and a generous array of carefully selected local products. The breakfast supplies were outstanding! The choices made by the hosts are very well considered and eco friendly. Cathy and Grant made the whole experience very easy and memorable. Check in / check out were a breeze and they communicated clearly throughout the process. We look forward to staying again and will highly recommend to friends.
What a great place to stay, very comfortable and stylish, and close to everything. To have places within walking distance was a great novelty.

Beautifully appointed and low impact villa, stylishly designed. Had everything we were looking for in a weekend getaway. Really well positioned on Seppeltsfield Road with good wineries and eateries nearby. Fantastic provisions left for breakfast and nibbles - much appreciated. Would definitely stay here again for a special weekend away as a couple.
Fantastic little villas with gorgeous little details bto make your stay extra special

Treat yourself and book one of Cathy and Grant’s cabins! Our stay was incredible, the cabins are stylish and equipped with everything you could need and more. There were soo many thoughtful little touches too, they went above and beyond! We will definitely be back.
Highly recommended location to make the most of any visit to the region. Wonderful accommodation with absolutely everything you could possibly need. A must stay

Perfect for couples to enjoy a romantic and peaceful get-away to appreciate each other and the beauty of nature. 
Surrounded with endless activities and highly rated restaurants. 
Thanks again!!
Stunning location! Great hospitality! So much to see and do. Will definitely be back again.
This stylish little getaway has all the amenities you need in a luxurious way. Being able to walk to neighboring wineries along seppeltsfield road is so handy!
A wonderful place to stay with beautiful scenery, local goodies and special touches!

Such an awesome little getaway that feels luxurious with the Aussie outback at your doorstep. Minutes away from the gin distillery and wineries - it’s the perfect spot for a weekend getaway! Very private, and all the yummy nibbles provided save you having to do any food shopping which is a bonus!
A homely, warm and spotlessly clean home with character that uou could relax in and enjoy all the history  and treasures of the psst.

Light Pass House was a delight!  Quaint, comfortable home furnished with eclectic period pieces surrounded by beautiful gardens.  

Generous breakfast provisions were provided and we had everything we needed.
Great character home, really close to everything in the Barossa. Comfortable, clean and great communication from our host! Would stay here again!
Faultless property. Spotlessly clean and very comfortable. Wonderful breakfast provisions and beautiful garden surrounds. Will be back.
Great place in a great location.....
This is a delightful cottage full of eclectic collections and lots of history.  Absolutely fantastic place to stay. It had everything we could think of and then some. Thanks for a wonderful stay.

We really enjoyed our stay at the light pass house. Such a unique home with so much character. Luke was easy to communicate with and a gracious host. The snacks and sparkling wine in the fridge was a lovely touch! Thanks for a wonderful stay. We would definitively come again!
Gorgeous house.Everything you could need for your stay and a lot more with extra little personal touches.Great hospitality and close to wineries.Would definitely return again.
Easy to go many historical church and vineyard. Luke is very kindly , great experience
A beautiful stay in a beautiful house. Well kept with plenty of space. Not too far from Nuriootpa, Angaston and Tanunda. Definitely recommend

This was a really nice place to stay with a beautiful garden. The key needs to be replaced as it didn’t work very well but apart from that problem Luke’s place was very comfortable and perfect for our stay. Luke was an excellent communicator and host.
Great stay, Luke’s house was a fantastic place to spend the night.

Thanks for this wonderful space! Absolutely perfect location, right in the heart of Tanunda and walking distance to really cool bars and restaurants. Short drive to fantastic wineries. The house was huge, so spacious, had everything we needed and was spotless! Wendy even put out a comfy bed and dog bowls for our pup which was such a nice touch! Would highly recommend!

Thanks for a great stay Wendy! House was super clean and spacious. Perfect location in Tanunda - everything walking distance (FermentAsian across the road, 1918 and Foodland around the corner and Z wines diagonally opposite). Wendy even supplied a baby bath after we let her know we were travelling with our 4 month old. Great hospitality, would recommend to everyone!
Great place. I loved the garden and a just a few seconds walk away is the main Street of Tanunda.
Excellent location, close to Main Street and amenities. Older facilities but a great host

Perfect location, attentive host and wonderful homely touches made for a very lovely and comfortable stay. Was especially handy having a baby bath, high hair and portacot for our 9 month old.  Easy walk to shops was a huge bonus. We shared the house with my parents in law and it worked well. Loved having fresh herbs in the garden to cook with too  Would definitely recommend and stay again!

Wendy has created a wonderful place to stay that really feels like home. She was very responsive and we really enjoyed the information she left on what to see around the Barossa. We would definitely stay again!
A clean and tidy house in a great central location. Wendy was friendly and quick with communications.
Amazing
Fantastic location
An amazingly located and beautiful venue in the heart of the Barossa with great modern touches and the host is very accommodating and thoughtful.
Fantastic place to stay,  great location, great house, great touches, a must to stay at, you won’t regret.

Wendy’s place is really perfect for a getaway in the Barossa. The house is cute, perfectly located in the heart of Tanunda, with very special touches such as having almond, soy and regular milk in the fridge. Highly recommend it!

An immaculate house in the centre of the Barossa. Beautiful and tranquil garden around the back to enjoy if you're home, and a stones throw (literally) to the town main street if you fancy meals out. Thank you Wendy.

Fantastic location next to two of the best restaurants in Tanunda and a short walk to everything Tanunda has to offer.  Very comfy spot with great amenities and super comfy beds plus a lovely undercover outdoor space which you can even enjoy if it's raining. I would definitely return.

It’s a gorgeous house right smack in the town centre. It’s so convenient and close by to every thing that you can possibly need!
Comfortably suited the 6 of us travelling from Melbourne. Great place; look no further!!!
Amazing host, beautiful well appointed home so close to everything
Top Notch

Wendy's place was beautiful - It was immaculate. Outside area to die for, and magpies around every corner. Bedding was quality and presented very well. Thoughtful touches for first-timers in the barossa such as ourselves were greatly appreciated! Location is excellent, surprisingly close to our wineries of interest and conveniently located near a foodland when we forgot to bring a few items! Also great value for money  - 10/10 would return!
A great stay and experience in the Barossa! Thanks Wendy for a wonderful time
a
Fantastic location in the heart of the Barossa, walking distance to all local Tanunda ammenities. Would definitely stay again!
The place is perfect. So central in Tanunda, can literally walk everywhere

This home is very Comfortable, spacious and in an excellent location.  The garden and outdoor area is particularly charming, a great place to have a Barossa wine.  There were many thoughtful inclusions, thank you Wendy, we plan to return one day.
If you are not staying here you are staying at the wrong place

Sue is super helpful and very friendly, The house is beautifully decorated and stylish.
Air con is a dream, Views are peaceful. Would use any excuse to stay here again
Beautiful cottage - loved the views and the pool table! Lovely bathroom and bedrooms, very spacious with plenty of room in every room.
We loved our stay that was so peaceful, with thoughtful provision and beautiful big rooms.

Amazing property, the house is just so beautiful. Very clean, enough kitchenware to entertain. So easy to communicate with and was just a phone call away.
You'll have some lovely sheep neighbours (we named them maisy and daisy hehe)
The best place to stay in the Barossa. Great hosts and Sue’s place is in a perfect location. It has great views and is tastefully decorated.

Although our stay was only for 1 night we felt at home straight away and the cottage provided everything we needed.
Alan & Sue, the hosts had provided lots of small touches and local flavors for us to use. This increased the value of staying with them. The cottage was spotless and provided a wonderful mix between city and rural amenities. I can highly recommend your stay with Alan & Sue.
Sue's place was perfect. Beautifully set up and cosy. Had everything we needed and more!

This is a lovely and welcoming facility.  A big plus is three bedrooms, with three queen-sized beds and lovely linens!  All rooms are large, spotless, and beautifully appointed.  Sue and Alan also lit the fire for us before we arrived, and had supplied local wine, cheese and crackers as a welcome.   We had a wonderful stay, and look forward to returning.    One tip for future guests:  when you check out, the pet wether and ram will be looking for their treat of fruit or vegetable.   Have something with you!   I did not, and had to forage for clover and grass before we left.  Great fun!

Lovely home with beautiful beds and cost wood fire! Easy to find, very hospitable with amazing breakfast provisions. Comfortable lounge space and very pretty outlook on Angaston/the Barossa. Would absolutely stay again. Thank you!

Sue and Alan have done a fab job renovating the cottage on their farm. The two sheep, Boofa and Grumpy were much loved by our 2 year old son. Sue met us on arrival with apple to feed them much to his delight! The bedrooms all have comfy beds with stylish and warm bedding. The living room is cozy with plenty of seating and a combustion stove which was lit for our arrival. A very welcoming sight on a cold August day! The bathroom is renovated and the kitchen well-stocked with delicious local bacon and eggs for breakfast. There is no heating at that end of the house so bring your ugg-boots if coming in winter! Thanks again Sue and Alan. We loved our stay!
Great place for a group to stay when visiting the Barossa. Hope to be back soon!
Great location, extremely clean and reasonably priced.
This was a fantastic spot for a long weekend getaway. Very comfortable and had everything we needed. Absolutely recommend and will be returning ourselves!

Sues place was a perfect for our quick overnight stay after our wedding. Check in was very easy and convenient. 
It was clean and spacious with a terrific bathroom. Surroundings were beautiful also.

Fantastic venue! Three really big bedrooms, nice touches like food for breakfast and a bottle of wine, and the hosts were incredibly accommodating - letting us check in early for a wedding we and yo get to. Highly recommend!
Great stay at the farmhouse, everything was super clean and comfortable. Lovely breakfast supplies. Easy check in and out and great communication. Would definitely recommend.
We had a great weekend at Sue’s place. The house was very clean and Sue’s communication was great! Would absolutely recommend to stay there! We’ll definitely be back!
A perfect rural retreat with some lovely homely touches. A beautiful cosy renovated farmhouse that makes for a comfortable stay in a delightful location
Outstanding location close to the Barossa, well stocked kitchen, renovated bathroom and well apportioned bedrooms made for an amazing visit. Would definitely return.
Really nice place
Beautiful accommodation in a beautiful environment.
A homely home. That was warm and cozy & had everything that we needed & more.

A nice isolated place for a couple or larger group to stay. The house is larger than expected, with roomy bedrooms and high ceilings. Each space is well cleaned. Breakfast, milk and juice as well as towels are provided for guests. Such a nice experience and place to get away.
The hosts were fantastic, the cottage was clean and spacious, we enjoyed a much needed break with the kids, we highly recommend this place.
A delightful heritage home located in the vines. Thoroughly relaxing and intriguing at once.
Great location
Outstanding location so quiet and peaceful
I would recommend it to everyone...the best between Eden and Barossa Velleys
Great place with great hosts
Cute and comfy with thoughtful touches

We really appreciated our stay at Adel and Adam's house, especially so as we made a late booking. It is in a beautiful setting and very peaceful and quiet.The room and bed were very warm and comfy and the bathroom and toilet although separate were very handy and no problem. A good choice of toiletries and breakfast were provided. Thank- you.
A beautiful feeling in a beautiful setting. Great place way to get away from it all. Thoughtful touches and amenities, kind and generous hosts :)
We liked our stay, the location was just amazing.

Fully surrounded by the neighbouring vineyard it was a great place to be for a restful country stay. The room is spacious and there are a lot of personal extra things, Adel and her husband have set up the room and environment to give something unique as hosts. Very peaceful

Couldn't have wished for more! The place feels very warm, welcoming and inviting. Everything was clean and the surroundings are very peaceful and a great location to visit the Barossa from. Also a great place for star gazing and her pets are very cute. Thank you for having us!
Beautiful peaceful spot, and great if you are going to a Seppeltsfield event like we were! Very accommodating, friendly, and the room had lovely touches like breakfast bits, hair dryer, etc.
Lovely spot in the Barossa Valley. Amazing landscape and views. The room was very clean, stylish and comfortable. Communication with the host was great
Our car were broken on the way to the house. Adel and Adam come to check and bring us home. The house is clean and wonderful in the vineyard.  Beautiful view around here
Nice and calm  place

Adel and Adam are excellent hosts. Communication is easy, and as people they are both warm, down to earth and kind. The space itself is lovely. Breakfast was provided which was a very pleasant surprise. The room is sparkling clean with high quality linens and furnishings. A quiet, serene place for those seeking seclusion and views. I cannot fault this stay at all. Many thanks!
Adel is very welcoming. It’s a clean room with all facilities needed. The location is amazing too!
Highly recommend for any reason or just to get away from “life”

What a peaceful and refreshing place to stay. Our hosts were friendly, welcoming and incredibly accommodating; the room was warm and friendly despite the chilly weather, and the atmosphere was peaceful and invigorating. The birds at their feeders in the morning were particularly enchanting and the view around the house was gorgeous. Thank you so much Adam and Adelle for your hospitality!
Beautiful location, near the Barossa cellar doors, good communication and amenities. thanks
Great hosts perfect peaceful location very clean you will have everything you need plus extra wild life and scenery to look at
Very spacious property and clean.
Ben is a fantastic host. Went above and beyond to make sure my stay was fantastic.
xxx

Made a corporate booking at this Airbnb - Ben was so helpful and easy to communicate with. Our workers said Ben's place was great and perfect location. We will definitely be booking here again if we are to return for future works. Thanks Ben.
Lovely house, spacious layout and lovely little outside area. Easy to to get to and very close to the wineries. We had a lovely stay!
Great place to stay got every thing and great hosts Cheers

We had a great time here. The place was really clean and way more homely than the photos make it look. Coffee machine which was an added bonus and everything you need in a kitchen. Handy spot, good base to get to most of barossa. Also great we could bring our dog away with us. Just makes going away for the weekend so much easier. Such a big space and can see it would be great if wanting to go away with friends.
This place was great!  I'll be back for sure.
房间很大,我们六人入住很好!
Valuable.
Absolutely amazing place! Fantastic location, and a huge amazing place. Very clean, very hotel like and amazing host with very quick responses! Coffee machine and milk in the fridge a huge plus!!
Great open plan living area perfect for families or groups of people.
Thanks!
A beautiful property in a beautiful part of South Australia!
Even better than we expected ! A very clean, comfortable and private 4x bedroom house ! Simply perfect for a great Barossa getaway.. Thank you for having us ! :)
Clean and well maintained. Away from the Main Street so no heavy traffic noises. Great to have an actual coffee machine rather than pods. Comfortable beds.
Great space, close to town.
A fabulous house, comfortable beds, very clean with everything you need. Highly recommended.

Ben's place was perfect for my wife and I. Super clean and comfortable. Everything we used worked. An excellent location for anyone wanting to explore the 'Barossa Triangle' (Nuriootpa, Angaston and Tanunda) and close to one of the best supermarket co-ops in Australia.
Great house. Had everything we needed for the week. Excellent quality beds in all bedrooms

Barossa Bliss was a great place for our girls weekend getaway. It’s a big house with every amenity we could think of. The outdoor area was lovely too. It was fresh and clean and the Star jasmine along the fence was glorious. Ben was a terrific host.
A good, practical option for your stay in the Barossa. Easy to get to, comfortably sleeps 8, plenty of things to do.
Lovely accommodation at an extremely convenient location. Clean and spacious. Rooms were comfortable! Happy to come back!

Great house and host. 
Would stay here again and recommend to others.
Good location and value for money and well appointed home.

Barossa Bliss was far beyond our expectations! Spacious, super clean and well thought out. 
Close and central to everything in the valley. 
We will be back! Thanks for your hospitality guys ☺️
The house was absolutely .
Well positioned for the attractions of the Barossa region, the house is spacious, clean and has many amenities. It was perfect for the five of us for our 4 night stay.
Clean and comfortable. Wonderful accommodation enjoyed by us and our dogs.
We really enjoyed our stay. Would highly recommend!
Great location, the house was fantastic and super comfortable.

Very clean house 
Spacious
The house had everything we needed for a weekend away and was very clean
Great place to stay and good value for money.  Ben was great to deal with.
Perfect for a 4 couples with the room layout.

I highly recommend both your communications with Ben, and his lovely home.  It is spacious, well appointed, and relaxing.  I was super impressed that there was even a coffee machine there! It has everything you need for a getaway. The linen was great quality and the central heating kept us lovely and warm. It's close to supermarkets and the main street. Great location. We will definitely be back and recommend
Great location and everything you could need
Convenient location. Great space for kids and pets.
Great place to stay for a few couples or 4 singles. Comfortable and clean.  Well appointed. Plenty of room. Short drive to the village and the surrounding vineyards.

This place is such excellent value for money we were looking for reasons it was so cheap! Being dog friendly was a big plus, as was the high quality heating perfect for our chilly trip. Easy check in and felt secure, excellent amenities and loved the cosy feel of the place.
Great location! Perfect place to hang out and relax with our dog in between exploring the Barossa. Kitchen is very well appointed. Ben made check in super easy. Highly recommend.
Our stay at Barossa Bliss was fantastic! Great location, extremely well priced and the house was sparkling clean and tidy with all the amenities we needed. We hope to be back!
This is a lovely roomy house which is very well set up.  The back garden beds need to be worked on but apart from that the house is perfect for a family or a couple of couples.
Nice place, very roomy and in a good location

Fantastic house, great yard and amenities, everything you could ever need. Great communication and check-in process as well as tips and guides on local food, wine, entertainment. Overall cannot fault the experience. Would stay again!
A great location to access the local wineries in Barossa valley by car. Large kitchen and bedrooms to accomodate several people. Fantastic amenities that make you feel at home.
Great location close to lots of fantastic little wineries!
Bens place is great value for money, clean and tidy and well set up. A bonus we could take the pooch! Thanks

Lovely, spacious home with comfortable  furnishings and quality linen. Airconditioned and clean. Plenty of books and games and TV to keep you entertained. Great host. Special touches such as wine glasses and platters make this an excellent venue for a group of adults to use as a base while they explore the Barossa Valley.
Great place to stay
Fabulous place to stay. There is plenty of room and it's very well appointed. Thoughtful touches were much appreciated. This is the second time I have stayed here it's that good.
A comfortable stay!
Beautiful home in middle of country side, great walks available. Downsides are you have to pay extra to stay only one night, and you have to pick up the keys from anothe location.
Fantastic retreat for our family. A real chance to appreciate the things that matter: family, flora and fauna and local community. A great part of the world and looking forward to our next stay here.

Beautiful place. Lots of thoughtful touches throughout the home. Woke up to a beautiful herd of deer on our first morning. That absolutely made the trip!
Would love to stay again in the summer time.

Graeme is a very welcoming and warm host, he is very helpful with anything and everything you may be concerned about - thank you Graeme. The property is beautiful for anybody whom loves nature and the outdoors, go for a wonder during the early morning to catch some kangaroos jumping around, watch beautiful birds taking baths as you sip your evening wine at the outdoor patio, and please don't miss the local boutique wineries (especially Ballycroft - beautiful full bodied wines) whilst you're there. Really need to stay for more than two nights if you are to enjoy the trip here. Have fun!

Wings is the perfect place to getaway and unplug. We stayed at wings with our 20mnth old son and the place was perfectly equipped for us to enjoy the surroundings, enjoy family meals immersed in nature, explore the Barossa Valley throughout the day, and have a peaceful sleep at night. 
We were also delightfully greeted on arrival by the resident roo his bunny buddy.

The stay was lovely. The house is beautiful and tidy! Nice touches for our wedding. Breakfast the morning after. A shame the communication wasnt great beforehand. No replies on Airbnb. No emails. (Even though we had confirmed our contact details) Had to call the owner to get more info. I'd definitely recommend installing a lock box or safe for easy access to the property. Key was an extra 15 minute drive to pick up and drop off. Other than this a nice place with lots wildlife and character! Thanks!
Really welcome host, really tidy room and love the beautiful piano in the house, really nice vacation house for party!

Wings is the perfect nature retreat.
The house is very cosy, clean and stylish with all you can need for a great weekend or longer stay. 

While we did not get to explore the Barossa wineries due to COVID restrictions they are all close.
Amazing remote property with access to amazing walking trails with lots of wild life. The home is clean and a joy to spend quality time with family next to the beautiful log fireplace.

Great house on a beautiful property with passionate hosts, we didn’t even want to leave except for a few walks around the property.  Nice cameo by the giant kangaroo looking through my window in the morning too
Great private property for kids to explore - we spotted birds, lizards, a koala and lots of kangaroos!
Such a beautiful and peaceful space - no TV or wifi so it’s just perfect to enjoy time together and unwind from busy working weeks.
A lovely house in the middle of an amazing patch of nature reserve.  Safe and fun for children, well appointed in all regards.  We had a wonderful stay.
A lovely house in a beautiful location. Well appointed and clean.
Wonderful place. Worth every penny.
A great stay on an incredibly beautiful property. Generous and helpful hosts.  Close to a lot of great attractions and experiences!
What a gorgeous and relaxing place! We loved it so much!! Will definitely come back

Our stay here brought us everything we wanted.. to get away from it all and enjoy some of Australia’s land uninterrupted. The house was perfectly suited to the environment. The little things we appreciated like the music provided, nice bathrooms and large spaces. Drinking wine and sitting under the vines was a bit of magic. Such a nice part of our holiday. We won’t forget staying at wings.
The place was in a secluded area on a huge property with lots of wildlife. The key pickup was 13km out of the way each way and was a hassle. A keylocker would make this experience so much better.
Graeme’s place is exceptional - very secluded with a lot of opportunities to see wildlife and enjoy silence and serenity of nature.

Thank you for letting us stay at BV House. I exceeded our expectations and was absolutely stunning. So much space for parking extra vehicles and all the ammenities were top quality. The house was immaculate and the finishing touches were impressive. We were very impressed as a whole with this house. 

Thanks kindly Kathy

Kathy's place is amazing. The photos don't do the house justice. There is so much space for everyone to relax and spread out if needed, but the big dining room and super comfortable lounge made it a great space to spend time with friends. We were able to walk to the Brewery which was a nice bonus. The amenities were all there, very modern kitchen and bathrooms and we had towels, soap, wine glasses, everything you could want on a getaway to the Barossa. Can't wait to return!
The place was very clean and only short walk from breweries and restaurants. We had 7 adults and 2 children and fit very comfortably. We will be back!

We planned a trip with 4 couples and based ourselves out of Kathy's house for two nights. When we weren't out exploring the Barossa we chose to stay in and relax at the house due to the great facilities on offer. The house was perfect to enjoy each others company - a bar, great cooking amenities, beautiful dining area, and a cosy fireplace. We had a blast and would thoroughly recommend to others. Great for larger groups. Would stay again.
Very impressed, much better than internet pictures. Hitech property.

Amazing place, the photos do not do it justice for how big the space was! 
Peter and Kathy provided everything you can think of. 
Easy check in.
The lounges were very comfortable with massive TVs with Netflix. 
The kitchen was well and truely stocked with the essentials to cook your own big meals or a bbq! 
They provided some snacks and a bottle of wine on arrival which was a thoughtful and sweet touch. 
The beds were very comfortable and had plenty of spare pillows and blankets if needed. 
The bathrooms were very clean and modern. 
Location wise very close to the main strip in Tanunda just a couple of minutes drive. 
Close drive to a lot of the famous wineries in Barossa. Definitely recommend staying at the BV house and will be returning for future vacations!
Great house, very clean and has everything you need. Very big and wonderful big back yard. There is an awesome bar with plenty of fridge space.

Amazing space. Pictures and description don't do it justice. High end appliances and amenities - quality throughout. Great backyard. Large indoor dining table and outdoor dining table. Perfect space for 2 or 3 couples and their kids.

Kathy was great with communication. Good arrival procedure, fair house rules, instructions provided for appliances and available if needed.

We found the location to be good.  Just on the edge of town but that suited us so we could park in town and walk the streets or bypass it when heading out if we wanted. You could easily take a pleasant walk in also.
Our family loved our stay here over the long weekend. Great layout and nicely child friendly for our 16 month old.

Many thanks to Kathy  and Peter for offering us this outstanding property. 
We were three families with 6 children ranging from 4-7 yrs. This  home  accommodated all of us comfortably. There are many high quality finishing touches to mention. 
Starting from comfortable beds, great quality sheets, extremely comfortable  luxury towels and amenities.
The  two living areas  with luxury comfortable sofas allowed us to relax and unwind in one area while the kids watched Tv in another section. 
The bathrooms are sparkling clean and relaxing. 
The kitchen is amazing , well  equipped and organised with high quality  appliances. 
We could live here for a month and would not feel home sick. 
The back yard was perfect for the kids with plenty of space. There is a bar  area too if adults want to stay at home and relax. 
Location was handy to everything in Barossa and our group had a memorable stay. 
This property sets a high standard for what an Airbnb property should be. 
Finally wonderful and easy communication with Kathy that ensured that we had a very smooth holiday  experience. 
We would like to congratulate kathy and Peter on such a well maintained home and would very much like to return back in the coming months.
Perfect for a weekend away with friends.

Awesome place to stay only minutes from Tanunda central. Spacious and well equipped house with great amenities and kitchen equipment, including coffee machine and great fridge with ice machine. The house was very clean and Apeter and Zksthy were great hosts. Very easy to communicate with and extremely helpful. I totally recommend this place!
lovely house, great for entertaining, immaculate, highly recomend
Spotlessly clean and tidy, lovely bedrooms, living areas and fully stocked kitchen. Wonderful weekend in Tanunda and a fantastic base for all activities.
Great place for a big group of us. Very comfortable and super modern amenities. Very clean and close to the main street of Tanunda.  Had a great time and would highly recommend!

I would gladly stay again. Lovely little homely touches which were unexpected. Plenty of space for the 7 adults (3 couples) and our toddler who didn’t want to leave. He was very impressed with the cubby, sandpit, lawn and toys. Suited us perfectly for our little extended family get away. Peter and Kathy were extremely accomodating and very quick to respond to any questions.
Perfect for families or small groups. Location is ideal, close to town and local wineries. Wonderful hosts. Accommodation spotless, comfortable and well appointed. Will be back.

Fantastic place . Very clean with great quilts and towels . We had 2 families, 4 adults and 5 kids , and it was a perfect size . We enjoyed the bar room and the separate entertainment areas enabling us to spread out. Great size TVs , with Stan and Netflix. Amazing access to the bike tracks . Nothing bad to say about it ! Peter and Kathy were very attentive too.
Great house, unbelievably clean, comfy beds and a fabulous shower.  A fabulous place to stay
It was just 5 stars!!!
First rate stay, everything was there. Our family and especially the grandchildren had a great time. Highly recommended
Beautiful spacious house. Plenty of gear in the kitchen and an amazing coffee machine. Beds were very comfortable and great heating. Outdoor area very good. Very child friendly.
Amazing

After having our orginal airbnb cancel on us last minute we found Peter and Kathy's place and they truly saved our weekend in the Barossa. thweir place was clean and so perfect for our group; ended up actually being a much better fit for our group being so family friendly. They left us some great treats and breakfast and check in was super easy. we can't wait to come back and stay again! xx
Incredibly clean and tidy house, ducted ac was perfect for the hot weekend we had. Recommend.

We had a great time staying at Peter and Kathy's place. BV house was so comfortable and conveniently located for us to move around the attractions in Barossa Valley. The large open space and facilities for kids were great to keep them occupied all day. Another important mention is the standard of entertainment and kitchen facilities that exceeded our expectations. Highly recommended for your next trip to Barossa Valley.
Very spacious house with big back yard, enjoyed the time there.

Great place in a great location.
Awesome value.
One of the best air bnb’s I’ve stayed at.

A lovely large home which was just right for our large family and grandparents. Loved the back yard with plenty of grass for the kids, BBQ and entertaining area. Ample parking in the front of the property. Very easy access to Tanunda (as you are right on the edge). Well equipped and spacious.

Absolutely stunning house, pictures do not do justice. Gives you a warm home feeling among modern living. Well worth the stay, it’s right in the middle of everything yet still giving you peace and quiet.
Great place in amazing location. Worth the stay!!

The house is beautiful, full of character, very clean, and couldn't be better located! Has an amazing kitchen and we really enjoyed playing the piano! So close to the main strip in Tanunda yet so peaceful and quiet. The welcome cheese platter and wine was a lovely and unexpected treat which we very much enjoyed! Perfect for a long weekend exploring the Barossa - we had a wonderful and very comfortable stay, thanks so much Fiona! Would definitely recommend this house to others!
Great location, a walk into town for food and drinks

Beautiful house centrally located very near local restaurants, cafes and shops. Lots of space and given we were there in winter we really appreciated the good heating! A wonderful spot to enjoy the Barossa.

Beautiful house! We loved our stay and couldn’t be happier. The rooms were clean and tidy and very spacious. Fiona was very quick to respond to any questions I had and helpful. Would definitely recommend if you are visiting the Barossa with a group :)

Visited Barossa from Melbourne for a long weekend with 5 girlfriends.
Everything about this property was great. Loved the location, the vibe and the extra touches (cheeses and wine on arrival).
The host was so quick to respond to any questions we had.
Definitely recommend to those costed Barossa. Great space.
Thank you!!
We all enjoyed our stay at this beautiful home. Great location and has everything you could need for an enjoyable stay! Would recommend staying here for sure
An amazing property in a great location. Fiona responded fast to any questions we had and the house was immaculate. Great entertaining area and plenty of space for 8 of us! Would highly recommend.

We had an amazing time and the property surpassed our expectations in terms of size,  decor, amenities etc. It was the perfect location close to everything in Tanunda and lots of local wineries. Fiona was an amazing host, very responsive, an easy check in process and lots of individual special touches. We and our friends loved the place and we all can't wait  to come back for another visit very soon! Would highly recommend this property for a special trip to the Barossa Valley.
Beautiful house in a fabulous location. In Tanunda for a girls weekend visited the Barossa Valley. Would highly recommend for a stay with friends and family!

Lovely property in an excellent location with a great bakery 2 mins away and easy walk in access to lovely Tanunda. This is a large house and a washing machine and place to dry clothes would have been the icing on the cake. There was an issue with the Aircon which Fiona sorted immediately and effectively. Many thanks indeed.
Property was amazing.. actually, it was perfect! Fiona and Chris were very nice and accomodating! The welcome wine and cheese platter was a great treat! Highly recommended! Absolutely loved our stay!
Great location for visiting the wine region and 1 min walk to main street in town. Massive house with lots of space - well renovated.
Beautiful house with so much character. A fabulous location so close to shops and restaurants. Top tip go to information centre for local knowledge, they were fabulous with recommendations.

Elizabeth house is breathtaking! One of the best AirBnBs we have stayed at. Perfectly located in the heart of Tanunda with plenty within walking distance. The residence is very spacious and the grounds had plenty of space for the kids to explore. The playground next door was handy too! Highly recommend
Beautiful house in an excellent location. Communication with Fiona is seamless.
Loved the house was perfect for a weekend away!
An amazing house in a perfect position! Great communication and a lovely surprise on arrival. Only a few moments to all the great restaurants and wine/gin bars!
Fiona’s place is fantastic, so close to town and it’s literally a mansion. Fantastic entertaining house!

This is a grand old stone home with a large attractive front and side garden, and it was beautifully presented.  The check in process with Fiona was seamless and we were greeted with a lovely platter of local cheeses and charcuterie waiting for us on our arrival. This is an ideal base for a family group or some couples.  The rooms are spacious and cool (we were there in summer and hardly needed to use the A/C in each room).  The home is located about 250m from Murray St, very close to FermentAsian and 1918 and the local shopping centre and various other cafes and restaurants.
Really enjoyed our stay. House is just beautiful. Walking distance to main street restaurants and pubs. My 80 yr old mum had a ball playing the piano!

Our stay in the chapel was nothing but a 10/10 experience. 
Fresh, clean and indulgent feel of a 5 star hotel with the added element of  all the comforts and condiments ( literally eggs, bacon, milk, tomatoes, bread, butter, jam, olives, wine) of home. It truly is everything you hoped it to be.

Jonathan was an extremely understanding and helpful host who let us be, and offered a hand when needed.  He went above and beyond, so thankyou for letting us stay at your place in lovely Lyndoch. We’ll be back.
Amazing house, amazing stay!
Excellent little place to stop and drop.

Lovely old chapel, very comfortable and full of thoughtful touches - we enjoyed the complimentary wine and port, made ourselves a lovely breakfast with the supplies provided, and enjoyed a roaring wood fire and watching a film on the telly after a hard day's wine tasting, haha. It was a little bit cold so had to keep the aircon going full time when fire not in play! Thanks Jonathan for a warm welcome and great communication and, of course, an enjoyable wine tasting day out.
We absolutely LOVED our stay! The accommodation was so beautiful. There were so many cozy spaces, beautiful furniture and amenities. It was perfect!
Beautifully styled property, perfect for a couples getaway. Generous breakfast provisions, warm and cozy for our mid winter retreat. Thanks for having us.
We had a wonderful weekend in the chapel, very clean, well presented & comfortable.  The breakfast provisions were fantastic.  Would definitely recommend it.
Gorgeous place for some time away!
A lovely place!!
Perfect hosts.. the space looks amazing in photos.. is 1000 times better still in person. Brilliant base for exploring the barossa and having a cheeky wine in the evening.
A unique experience in a renovated chapel.  A gorgeous combination of the traditional with all modern conveniences!  Generous and thoughtful provisions.
Thank you Kate and Jonathan. Your place was perfect for our kid free get away! Would definitely recommend. Absolutely beautiful place and area, close to so many amazing wineries and restaurants.
Spotlessly clean. Very roomy for a couple- amazing spa bathroom. Beautiful fresh clean linen, great bed. Quiet and safe location. Highly recommended!
Awesome place to stay, full of character.

Beautiful property for easy access to Barossa wineries. Stylish and spacious with thoughtful touches. The Wi-fi was down when we visited but Jonathan was very apologetic about it and said it was being resolved.

The Chapel is a really cute and unique property, well stocked and very comfortable, in an excellent location for exploring the Barossa. We enjoyed our NYE holiday with friends in the house. 

There were a few minor maintenance issues (which were noted by the owners on arrival) and it would have been great to have some curtains upstairs as the sun comes in very early this time of year, but otherwise we enjoyed the house. Definitely note that both bedrooms are open with very little privacy which may be an issue for anyone concerned about that.

Great spot for a very relaxing few days. We took up Jonathan’s offer of a private tour of the Barossa and Eden valleys, and we had a wonderfully pampered and informative day. Perfect long week getaway.
Great place and great experience! Perfect pick for a romantic getaway!
A very cozy and charming place to spend a romantic getaway.
Great wee place to relax, some things to work on but we still had a great weekend.

Photos do not do this place justice! We booked in for a relaxing weekend away, and were absolutely blown away when we arrived. The bath tub is worth mentioning - its more like a swimming pool and was the highlight of our stay. The styling and renovations to the old chapel are stunning and complimentary to its heritage. Hosts provided great advice on wineries to visit. I've had many friends contact us and ask where we stayed and have happily referred them on!

Jonathon and Kate have created a wonderfully romantic space and a a treasure for the Barossa. The location is close to wonderful wineries and a short trip to great restaurants. Its perfect for a weekend away! Thank you and hopefully we have the opportunity to return in the future!

What a wonderful place to stay, cosy with great facilities. 

Jonathan and Kate were easy to communicate with, and provided some great local tips. 

Everything was sparkling clean and as described.
A beautiful, beautiful space.

We had a wonderful stay in this beautiful cottage. Stayed here 20 years ago for our wedding night and the new renovations have only added to the place, whilst still keeping the character. Everything you need is supplied and lots of little touches to make it a warm comfortable place to relax and unwind. The addition of the spa bath was perfect and with added touches of candles made it very romantic. A glass of Shiraz in front of the fire certainly didn’t hurt, either! Fantastic place to base yourselves from which to explore the region and would definitely recommend.

Beautiful location in a fantastic little town, close to supermarket and cafe/bakery. Stunning views and walking distance to wineries. Gorgeous accommodation, comfortable and cosy with the wood fire and amazing huge bath. Very responsive hosts and lots little touches like tea, coffee and milk.
Definitely recommend a stay.

The Chapel is definitely something very special! As other reviewers have mentioned, the pictures don't quite do it justice; when we arrived we were just blown away by this amazing space. Very cosy and comfortable, and has everything you could need. The spa bath is AMAZING, so relaxing. 
It's in a perfect spot to explore the barossa, close to so many amazing wineries. Jonathan and Kate are great hosts, everything was easy. We will definately be back!

Thanks for offering up this amazing space in Lyndoch, a short drive from all that the Barossa has to offer. The Chapel is a beautiful and tasteful conversion. Very warm in the middle of winter, good amenities and the outstanding bath must be mentioned. Thanks for your hospitality and will definitely recommend to anyone looking to stay somewhere stylish and sweet.
Mike

Beautiful, one of a kind home. We loved all the small touches and the fire kept us warm! Love the Barossa but felt conflicted leaving the house as The Chapel is enough of a reason to visit on it’s own! Thank you
Such a beautifully renovated chapel in a stunning region. Warm, lovingly decorated space for all to enjoy. LOVED the spa bath!
An incredible house with some really thoughtful touches added. A lovely space which was perfect for our relaxing getaway. Thank you so much! We will definitely be coming back

The chapel is even more amazing than it looks in the photos! It’s been renovated and decorated beautifully, close to local shops etc, and have tons of brochures and info available on local things to do.
A lovely place to stay close to some great wineries
Such a fun and enjoyable place to stay, perfect for day time wine tasting and night time relaxing.

A beautiful and quirky place to stay with lots of nice touches. Very clean and well presented. Gorgeous quiet setting. Hosts are very helpful. All the amenities you need. A great place for a winter retreat.

The Chapel is a stunningly beautiful and thoughtfully refurbished old building in the heart of Lyndoch 
Our hosts were so attentive and helpful 
The interior of the Chapel was luxurious.   Beautiful linen and towels    The decor tasteful 
The welcoming wood fire a definite plus 
We relaxed and recharged. We highly recommend this holiday destination.  Deb and Tina
Super cute and cozy
Unique, charming, perfect!

An absolutely wonderful place to stay in the Barossa. The period features and decor of the Chapel are simply gorgeous. The spa bath was so luxurious and perfect for unwinding. Jonathon and Kate were wonderful hosts ensuring all our needs were catered to. We will definitely be coming back.

Such a beautiful relaxing stay! That spa bath was absolutely amazing! Easy location to find with easy check-in. Sweet decor, with everything lovely and clean. Very homey indeed. Would love to come again!
Beautiful renovated chapel. Has everything you need, comfortable space. Jonathan and Kate very responsive and helpful.
Picturesque chapel accommodation in a quiet neighbourhood. Nice amenities and thoughtful touches.
Great accomodation with all the little touches to make it specially. Couldn’t recommend it enough!
Great weekend get away!

Throughout our stay, Jonathan and Kate were easily contactable and communication was easy and genuine. Good parking just off the street, and the check in process was also very quick and easy. 

Loved the amenities, especially the spacious bath! Hot water and heating throughout the place was spot on! Will be recommending this place to family and friends for sure!

If you’re looking for somewhere to stay in the Barossa, then this is the perfect place!! We had an amazing stay at the chapel. It is well located and close to several excellent wineries and food options. The chapel itself has so much character and a nice touch of luxury. You could easily sleep 4 adults in the chapel quite comfortably with the two separate sleeping areas. We couldn’t  recommend staying here more!

The Chapel is absolutely amazing. Me and my partner had the best time. The hosts are beyond helpful and the space is beautiful. Could not recommend this stay enough. The wine tour with Johnethan is a must do and exceeded our every expectation. We cannot wait to come back
Beautiful space, quaint, had a lovely stay here
The chapel was a stunning place, with old world charm and an amazing bath tub. We loved our stay!

We arrived after dark and found a beautifully lit cottage that was a delight from the outside. The interior was no less disappointing. It was warm and welcoming. The interior tastefully decorated. The owners have gone to extra time and effort to supply all the comforts of home. We loved our stay and would highly recommend it. Hopefully we will be able to come back one day.

The Chapel provided the most relaxing and indulgent holiday ever. We enjoyed the quiet location, picturesque views, beautiful building, and the overall unique experience. Jonathan was very welcoming and clearly knew the area well. A brilliant place for a romantic getaway or a girls trip!

Perfect location to all the local towns. Never had a problem getting a taxi anywhere if we wanted to both have a wine. 

Accomodation so peaceful & relaxing. Everything you need. Their hair dryer saved my life. All the things you need for extended stay. Will definitely book again if we need accomodation in the area.
This is a cute and well appointed cottage. I'd give it a 5 star rating except that the gap between the walls and roof in the stunning main bathroom allowed dirt and insects in. Otherwise beautiful.

Jonathan and Kate were lovely hosts. The spa bath in the middle of the open space was the best! There were many small touches such as the robes, towels and milk, tea/coffee and breakfast items. Although it was just the two of us for a romantic weekend, there’s enough space for two couples with the upstairs section. The location is good with a few hotels and cafes around the corner, and the Barossa wineries starting just there. Would love to stay again!

My wife and I were blown away by the beauty of the chapel. It was truly stunning to stay in such a beautiful and well redesigned heritage building. The finishes such as the staircase and bathroom really added to the positive experience. A point of growth for the hosts would be to work on cleanliness between guests such as vacuuming thoroughly, checking all the dishes are cleaned properly and cleaning dirt off the bath robes. Outside of cleanliness, we would recommend this stellar stay
Was a nice enjoyable stay

The Chapel is such a unique, beautiful and central option for Barossa accommodation. It was spacious and an extremely beautiful building. Coming to the Barossa for the first time, Jonathan and Kate had lots of great local suggestions available and the Chapel had generous amenities. Highly, highly recommend!!
It's a cool place. Jonathan and Kate were very kind to let us check out late as it was the morning after our wedding. The kitchen door did not lock though which was not good.
Very unique stay in beautiful old Chapel. Lovely bathroom with big bath. Jonathan took us on a wine tour which was also a great experience. Highly recommend.

Booked this airbnb for my parents as a birthday gift to my mother. They both absolutely loved the place and came back with raving reviews! They showed me around through facetime and it looked absolutely gorgeous

Outstanding accommodation. Walking distance to the local township and a great base to the entrance of the Barossa. The bathroom area is glorious and a great place to relax after cycling the gorgeous Barossa Bike Trail. The community spirit in Lyndoch is infectious.. would highly recommend staying at the Chapel... we’ll be back.

We couldn’t have been happier with our stay at The Chapel. The accommodation was even more stylish than the photos suggested and the hosts saw to every little detail (including a welcoming decanter of port on the coffee table). I would thoroughly recommend the beautiful Chapel to any friends or family travelling to Barossa! Thanks again Jonathan and Kate.
The Chapel was amazing! Great distance from most wineries and a very homely and comforting place! Would definitely recommend!

My girlfriend and I both booked a stay at The Chapel and were blown away. The photos do not do this place justice.  

If you’re looking for an affordable stay that is close to all the wineries in the region, is visually stunning and has fantastic hosts this is the place to book. 

John gave both of us plenty of tips for the area for places to both eat and see. John also has his own wine tour business and this was certainly the highlight of our trip. The tour picked us up from the chapel and was tailored to places we were interested in. I was not a big wine drinker but I sure am now. 

If you want to experience the full taste of the Barossa this air Bnb and wine tour is a must.
If you’re traveling to the Barossa this is the place to stay. So get in early, don’t miss out.
Very romantic place, comfortable with plenty of thoughtful touches.
Highly recommend winery tour by Jonathon
Thank you
Beautiful building, super comfortable beds and excellent touches. Really quick responses and very helpful.

Steve’s place is very picturesque and cozy. We would stay there any time of year, and it is located in a great spot, central to lots of wineries and restaurants. Heritage wines have some delicious wines on offer and Steve was a great host who responded promptly and was very friendly!  We highly recommend Lucy’s House for accomodation in the Barossa.
Fabulous cottage filled with awsome local produce in a very central location loved it
Beautiful place, stayed cool in the heat, breakfast food was delicious, walking distance to Tscharke Wines and the Seppeltsfield Road Distillers. Highly Recommended!

Lucy’s house is well positioned, quiet and a great base to explore the Barossa from. We enjoyed the house and found it very comfortable.
Steve is used to hosting guests and he knows when to offer information as well as allowing guests their privacy.
Lovely accommodation, location was good   Steve was a great host, will definitely stay again
Lucy’s House exceeded our expectations and Steve was a wonderful host and great ambassador for the Barossa. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and highly recommend it.

Steve is a warm generous host and while the property is a little pricey, the location is very quiet and convenient and well stocked with breakfast provisions and other items. Very clean and underfloor heating is very efficient.
Fantastic cottage with gorgeous views, thoughtful touches and an amazing amenities
Great location, host, facilities and peace and quiet. Exceptionally warm and cosy cottage with a great little history.  Thoroughly recommend and would book again.

Had a lovely stay at Lucy’s House. Lots of little touches by Steve that made the stay extra special. Location is close to lots of other Barossa attractions which was also great. Will definitely be back!

Lucy's house reminds those who stay there that little is needed to enjoy a weekend and be happy. The cottage is small yet provides everything needed for a couple to have a fantastic time! And Steve was very hospitable and kind.
We won't ever forget the time we had here

Great place to stay while visiting the Barossa Valley. The unit was very comfortable and very clean. Tracy is a fabulous host who made us feel welcome. Very happy to recommend and hope to come back again!
Excellent spot, close to everything. Clean and well thought out. Thanks

Tracy's place is in a terrific and quiet location right behind the main street of Tanunda. Short walk to local cafes and local cellar doors. The design is modern and spacious and in particular, the beds were very comfortable and afforded a really good night's sleep. We are 2 professional couples that arrived 4 hours before the 3pm check-in and Tracy allowed us to have access to the place immediately.  Overall I'd recommend it highly and we look forward to staying in the apartment the next time we visit the Barossa.
Regards,
Jim Dimas

Absolutely amazing! The property is absolutely beautiful and more than I anticipated.
The location is sublime, right near the beautiful centre of Tanunda and near some spot on wineries (David Franz is a must!).
Don't look elsewhere - improve your trip and stay here!

We spent several nights in the glorious Barossa Valley and had the pleasure of staying at the amazing Boseka apartment in Barossa . Our hosts Tracy and Jaysen absolutely nailed this place with providing very thoughtful amenities and a continental organic breakfast which was a treat! This apartment has been purpose equipped as guest accommodation and the warm but stylish design and decor in the open plan living area was exceptionally welcoming. The beds are extremely comfortable and the property is well situated just a few moments stroll to the main street in Tanunda, centrally located in the Barossa Valley! Truly the best way to experience the delights of the Barossa.

I can't say enough good things about this place, the owners have done an amazing job from top to bottom. No detail has been overlooked. It is a testament to the fact that you can have a beautiful place in a beautiful location and still set yourself miles apart with an amazing space and wonderful thoughtful touches. Form the moment we arrived, we were made to feel like we were in luxury yet always felt at home and comfortable.

Tracy’s place was lovely, and in a really central location! Short walk away from lovely cafes and shops. Beautifully decorated, clean and perfect for what we needed. Great for a couple or even small family. Tracy gave us some fantastic recommendations which we tried most of, and they really made our stay so worthwhile! Highly recommend! Such a beautiful part of the world! We will definitely be back :)
A beautiful and comfortable space, with so many touches of luxury. Wished we could have stayed longer, the location was perfect for walking around and enjoying the town!
Great location in the Barossa and very comfortable accommodation.

Clean, spacious
townhouse, and really good cooking facilities.

Lovely, well appointed townhouse in a great, central location. Cosy but lots of light. Everything was well organised, super tidy and well laid out. Nice breakfast left for us. Perfect! We would definitely stay again. Beck
Beautiful place and perfect  location!
Light, clean and bright. Great location. A bit chilly (albeit we came at the start of winter!) downstairs so pack some warm layers!

What a fantastic location (a minute walk to the main road and Nosh which had superb coffee) and amazing place to stay. Beds were so comfortable, a warm and inviting place to stay we would love to come again!

We had a fantastic stay at Tracy’s place - it was walking distance to Tanunda’s amenities, really clean and stylish and complete with breakfast goodies. Thank you for an incredible trip to the Barossa!

Boseka is an amazing gem on the heart of the Barossa Valley. A spacious 2 bedder with an amazing kitchen and open planned family space. Did expect the kitchen to be stock with bread, eggs, milk, butter and the most beautiful locally made gig jam. 
We would definitely come back with more family or friends

Definitely recommend this accommodation only 1 street back from the main Street. Looks from the outside are deceiving as what is inside is very cool and stylish. Very warm during winter with the air conditioners on. Would definitely stay here again if ever in the Barossa again.
Tracy’s home was lovely. Clean, tidy and really comfy beds. Great location and lots of space

Beautiful town house, just as the pictures show. Lovely fresh decor and well stocked kitchen with thoughtful inclusions like tea, coffee, milk, bread, jam and eggs.  Great location only a short walk to the shops, cafes and restaurants on the main Street. Was wonderfully cosy and warm. Easy and fuss free access and communication. Great stay and a lovely place to visit. We hired bikes that were delivered to the door and had a lovely time.

Everything was just as expected. The place was gorgeous, even better than the photos. So stylish and perfectly clean and free of clutter. The place was spotless, the bedding was clean and fluffy. Breakfast provisions were a nice touch, in the clean, minimalistic kitchen. It was very quiet and peaceful and there are great places to eat and buy wonderful wines in short walking distance. A perfect stay, very happy, would recommend!

very easy self check in. 
the house is just behind the main street, food & bar is just 300-1km away.
i assume this is a new refurbish house, most of the item are new.
specious high ceiling, stylish white modern design.
the host welcomed us with some fresh eggs, jam, butter, milk & bread.
hotel standard bedding & linen.
L shape sofa is just an additional chill place for gadget.
outdoor is too cold for us to enjoy but it is a nice place to relax, with additional 2 big cat come as guest.
enjoy staying this place. 
LIKE !

Perfect spot within walking distance of main street with cafes and wine bars in Tununda. Beautifully presented apartment with lots of space. Stayed with three others and there was plenty of room. Lots of nice touches like the fresh bread and eggs, lots of cosy spots for dinners in with a wine, and TV for a bit of relaxation after all the wine tasting. Found the place to be very good value and in a great position.
Excellent location and beautiful house with all modern amenities.

An absolutely lovely space for a small group that is only a walk away from local cafes and restaurants. Returning to a clean and open house made our first time exploring Barossa Valley an enjoyable one. Tracy also made it an easy trip with providing information and suggestions for the area and being accomodating. Would return again!
